AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero: Defendant involved in a case of reckless endangerment and death enhancements while transporting unlawful aliens into the United States, with a base offense level enhanced due to the death of Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez. Argued against sentence enhancement under reckless endangerment guideline. Provided inaccurate advice on journey length to the aliens. Transported illegal aliens for money, knowing they were illegal aliens. Guided individuals through the hot South Texas desert in the dead of summer.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.KING: Chief Judge presiding over the case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez: Undocumented female alien who died due to heat stroke during transportation by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jaime Gomez-Arroyo: Met with border patrol agents after the death of his niece, Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero, Alma Delia Si: Group of nine aliens guided by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero for financial gain
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Cuyler: Defendant in a case regarding reckless conduct in the transportation of illegal aliens, where offense conduct created a substantial risk of death or serious bodily injury
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rodriguez: defendants in a case involving guiding illegal aliens into the United States via the mountains between Mexico and San Diego for financial gain
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero and others: defendants involved in cases related to the transportation of undocumented aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Herrera: court in the Ninth Circuit that addressed whether intent is required for an enhancement under a specific subsection and made a statement regarding causal connection between offense conduct and death or injury in a footnote
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Defendants in Rodriguez case: guides employed by alien smugglers to transport illegal aliens into the United States via the mountains between Mexico and San Diego for financial gain, lacking proper supplies and information about the journey
